msbt.message: ! Can you believe Festivale is finally here?Now that you've arrived, we can truly start the celebration.

Pardon me, , but Oh! You don't have any feathers, do you?I suppose we're in a similar boat! There's a particularly lovely color of feather I'm hoping to collect.Of course, silly me, I forgot my net, so that may be tricky. If it's not too much trouble, please wish me luck!
I'm trying to collect all the different feathers, but I still haven't caught .If you end up catching any extras, maybe we could help each other out!
Tee-hee, you look wonderful! That Festivale outfit is perfect.Maybe we could take a nice little picture together later, if you have the time. That would make my day!
Wow, . You look like a breath of fresh air in that outfit, .Let's have a great Festivale together! I just know this will be one to remember.
Pav√©'s dancing is a sight to behold. I don't think I can pull off those moves quite like he does.Still, I'm giving it my all! As long as I try my best, I know I'll have a great Festivale.
Technique is important to the art of dance. Of course, so is the emotion and energy you put into it.Um, at least that's what it said in this neat how-to book I read, .
Say Have you seen any rainbow feathers floating in the sky?I've been so focused on dancing, I'm afraid I haven't been keeping an eye out for them.
Is this outfit a bit too bold for me? Heehee, I suppose it doesn't matter. It's nice to let loose sometimes!
Hello, ! Care to join me, ?Let's dance our hearts out and make some great memories today!
Dancing in the warm embrace of the sun is simply delightful!If nothing else, let's both make sure to dance, dance, dance today!
I have a bit of trouble keeping up with the rhythm of the music, but I'm having so much fun trying!
This day really flew by! It's late, but I'm not sleepy at all, even though I've been dancing up a storm.That must be part of the magic of Festivale, !
Even indoors, you can still feel all of the great energy from today's festivities.I'm taking a little break right now, but I'm already itching to get dancing again, .
I love taking a nice rest inside, but it's hard to keep still today!I also can't seem to cool off from all the dancing I did earlier, .
I'm so excited from Festivale that I have half a mind to make .I bet it would really fuel everyone's dancing! It's just too bad I don't have time for that today.
Festivale is an all-day celebration, so if you ever need to rest, feel free to come take a break with me.
It's fun to dance outdoors, but honestly, I have just as much fun chatting with you inside.
I can hear that great music even when I'm inside. It's like the spirit of Festivale is all around us!I'm excited to get out there again, but I needed a little breather first, .
Everyone's enjoying Festivale! I plan to get back out there too, but first I need to rest these poor feet a bit.
It may be late, but you can hardly tell! Everyone's so fired up.Hmm Some folks must be starting to feel tired though. Maybe they'd appreciate a nice ?
Oh, hey! Do you happen to have ?Perhaps you'd be willing to trade it for my ?
Let's trade!
Sorry, but no.
Please forgive my bluntness, but do you happen to have ?If you wouldn't mind, could I maybe trade you for my ?
Of course!
I'm afraid not.
Really? Oh, joy! Let's go ahead and make the exchange!
Oh, I'm so grateful you've decided to trade with me! I hope it's not too much of a bother.
I'm so happy right now! I really can't thank you enough, .
Thank you so very much! You're always someone I can count on, .
Oh? You don't feel like trading? I can't blame you one bit.
Oh dear, I knew I was asking for too much. Forget I asked, .
Soyou're OK with trading of your for of my ?
Yes, please!
Wait, never mind.
